threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the execution of programs as Launch Agents or Launch Daemons using launchctl on macOS.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via CommandLine
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: James Pemberton / @4A616D6573, Endgame, JHasenbusch, oscd.community, Austin Songer @austinsonger

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a curl process start on linux, which indicates a file download from a remote location or a simple web request to a remote server

attributes.magic: Bourne-Again shell script, ASCII text executable

crowdsourced_ai_results.analysis: The script first downloads and executes the Node Version Manager (nvm) installation script from GitHub. It then uses nvm to install and activate Node.js version 20.19.0. Following this, the script downloads a file from `https://nvidiasdk.fly.dev/nvs` and saves it locally as `~/.linvidia`. This download operation utilizes a custom user agent string and disables SSL certificate verification. Finally, the downloaded file `~/.linvidia` is executed in the background using the Node.js interpreter, with its standard error stream redirected to standard output.
